issue.title: Homebrew problem with protobuf and plugins (dlclose)

content.raw:
The original idea about not installing into /usr/local was to get testing with some kind of isolation (low in this case) from one runs to another. Since there is no chroot nor docker to run osX, we went with a different directory installation for every testing run.

I was looking into the test-bot and seems like they are relaying on a git tree to get this kind of isolation (cleaning up the git tree, which I'm assuming that will reset the whole status). But I did not find any mention to /usr/local in the test-bot nor can imagine how are they cleaning the /usr/local for every run.
